Sentencas: Energy storage systems (ESSs) were introduced to overcome the risks posed by energy curtailment.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: In this paper, we compare the Levelized cost of storage (LCOS) for PEM Reversible Fuel Cells, Solid Oxide Fuel Cells, and Lithium-Ion Batteries in three different locations in the United States (Tucson, Seattle, and Rochester) that are characterized by different energy consumption profiles.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: This research examines three commercial buildings of different sizes: small, medium, and large, with three occupancy profiles: low, medium, and high energy consumption in each of the three locations.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: The objective is to quantify the impact of uncertain demand and uncertain financial parameters on the LCOS.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: The results show that all ESSs can represent an attractive alternative to energy curtailment regardless of the building size or the occupancy profile.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: Further, the results show that fuel cells are a better fit for demand uncertainty as they are more resilient to changes and remain attractive despite that.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: The uncertainty analysis showed that the minimum LCOS was $0.049/kWh, and it was for a PEM-RFC in a small building in Tucson under high energy consumption behavior.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty

Sentencas: Oppositely, the maximum LCOS was $0.679/ kWh, and that was for a large building in Seattle under high energy usage occupancy as well.
Titulo: Techno-economic assessment of energy storage systems in green buildings while considering demand uncertainty
